The Idolatry of Ahaz (2 Chronicles 28:16–27)

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Ahaz \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w Tiglath-pileser|strong="H8407"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria. \w On|strong="H7200"\w* \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Ahaz \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* Uriah \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w model|strong="H8403"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w complete|strong="H3605"\w* plans \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* construction.
